InformationURL.Name: ISEE Magnetometer Interactive Data Server
InformationURL.Description: The ISEE-1 and ISEE-2 magnetometer data server is provided by the Institute of Geophysics and Planetary Physics (IGPP) at UCLA, through a grant to Robert J. Strangeway from the NASA Space Physics Data System (SPDS).
